summary:
Under the assumption of positive multiplicity, we obtain basic estimates of
the hypergeometric functions F\_\la and G\_\la of Heckman and Opdam, and sharp
estimates of the particular functions F\_0 and G\_0. Next we prove the
Paley-Wiener theorem for the Schwartz class, solve the heat equation and
estimate the heat kernel.
